Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.miktim.websocket.WsConnection.EventHandler
    Use WsConnection.Handler interface instead.
    org.miktim.websocket.WsServer.EventHandler
    Use WsServer.Handler interface instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.miktim.websocket.WsConnection.MESSAGE_QUEUE_CAPACITY
    Use WsConnection.setMaxMessages method instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.miktim.websocket.WsServer.close()
    use stopServer methods instead
    org.miktim.websocket.WsServer.close(String)
    use stopServer methods instead
    org.miktim.websocket.WebSocket.getBindAddress()
    Use getInterfaceAddress method instead.
    org.miktim.websocket.WsServer.getBindAddress()
    accessed via ServerSocket methods
    org.miktim.websocket.WsConnection.getSocket()
    use WebSocket.getConnectionSocket or WsServer.getConnectionSocket instead
    org.miktim.websocket.WsServer.interrupt() 
    org.miktim.websocket.WsServer.isInterrupted() 
    org.miktim.websocket.WsServer.isOpen()
    use isActive method instead
    org.miktim.websocket.WsServer.launch()
    org.miktim.websocket.WsConnection.listConnections()
    use WsServer.listConnections or WebSocket.listConnection methods
    org.miktim.websocket.WsServer.Handler.onAccept(WsServer, WsConnection) 
    org.miktim.websocket.WebSocket.SecureServer(int, WsConnection.Handler, WsParameters)
    Use startSecureServer methods instead.
    org.miktim.websocket.WebSocket.Server(int, WsConnection.Handler, WsParameters)
    Use startServer methods instead.
    org.miktim.websocket.WsServer.setHandler(WsServer.Handler)
